name: FortyEight
goal:
FortyEight is a Brussels-based consultancy
specialised in advising companies operating in
regulated markets. Our areas of expertise cover
a broad range of policies, in particular energy,
environment and climate change.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Clean Energy Package
- Interconnection of energy networks (TEN-E)
- Gas Market Framework
- Climate Action (EU and global level)
- ETS
- Circular Economy
- Digital Single Market
- Transport (low-emission mobility)
- Competitiveness
